original: Atthi imasmiṁ kāye—Kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco, maṁsaṁ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṁ vakkaṁ,
analyzed: atthi imasmin kāye kesāḥ lomā nakhāḥ dantāḥ tacaḥ masam nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjam vakka

original: hadayaṁ yakanaṁ kilomakaṁ pihakaṁ papphāsaṁ, antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariyaṁ karīsaṁ matthaluṅgaṁ,
analyzed: hadayam yakanam kilomakam pihakam papphāsa antam antaguṇam udariyam karīsam matthaluṅga

original: pittaṁ semhaṁ pubbo lohitaṁ sedo medo, assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti.
analyzed: pittam semham pubbaḥ lohitam sedaḥ medaḥ assu vasā kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti
